entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:49 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -40.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 52 in the evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
